main event: A UFO was observed as a bright light over the University of Luzon, P.I. on 7 November 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a large star-like light,The sighting lasted only 2 to 3 seconds,The object appeared stationary during the observation,The conclusion suggested it was a ball-shaped light, possibly a natural phenomenon like a meteor or fireball,The report was part of the Project Blue Book documentation.
witness description: The sighting was conducted visually with no radar corroboration.
